author: Andy Pearson
method: Pour the vodka into a highball glass and top up with orange juice. Carefully add the Galliano to the top of the drink to create a separate layer. Serve garnished with an orange slice and a cherry.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz vodka ,  orange juice, to top up ,  1 tbsp Galliano, or similar anise and herb-flavoured liqueur,  1 orange slice, to garnish,  1 cherry, to garnish
